item.title: @RSnake â€™s RFI List in Burp Suite
item.author: mubix
item.description: First of all, get Robert @RSnake Hansen’s RFI list here: http://ha.ckers.org/blog/20100129/large-list-of-rfis-1000/ it’s a great list, but as soon as I saw it, I was like.. hmm.. how can I use that? Well, being that I am a Burp fan, I parsed the .dat with the following line: 1 cat rfi-locations.dat | grep -v "^#" | awk -F '?' '{print $1}' | sort -u > rsnake_list.txt This pulls his list down to 906 entries which you can load in to Burp and hammer away with Intruder.
